header.description: Required The content type of the request body:

request.description:
# Description Register a new user into the application providing his/her essential information ## Response Format On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is 201 Created. The response body contains the token that will be used to authorize the user and user object. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. ### user object
Key Value Type Value Description
name string The name that the user provided for himself.
email string The email the user provided.
_id string The Symphonia ID used to identify the user in our application.
## Request parameters ### Body parameters
Key Value Type Value Description
name string Required: The name that the user provided for himself.
email string Required: The email the user provided.
password string Required: The user password.
passwordConfirm string Required: The user password confirmation.
DateOfBirth date Required: The date of birth for the user.
Gender string Required: The gender of the user should be "male" or "female" only.

request.description:
# Description login the Symphonia user into the application providing his/her registered email # Response Format On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is `200`. The response body contains the token that will be used to authorize the user and user object. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. # Example ## user object
Key Value Type Value Description
name string The name that the user provided for himself.
email string The email the user provided.
_id string The Symphonia ID used to identify the user in our application.
# Request parameters ## Body parameters
Key Value Type Value Description
email string Required: The email the user provided.
password string Required: The user password.

request.description:
# Description when a user forgets his password he provides his email so we can help him get into his account. # Response Format On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is `200`. The response body contains a message telling the user to check his email inbox. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. # Request parameters ## Body parameters
Key Value Type Value Description
email string Required: The registered user email in Symphonia application.

request.description:
# Description The user using the provided token can send the new password for the account to be set. # Response Format On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is `200`. The response body contains the access token for the user. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. # Request parameters ## Body parameters
Key Value Type Value Description
password string Required: The new account password.
passwordConfirm string Required: The new account password confirmation.
